text: 8. Gorgeous Gorgeous, which was released prior to the full album release, is about someone who finds it hard to look at another person because they ’ re strongly attracted to them and the fear of rejection lies therein. “ You ruined my live by not being mine. ” During one of Swift ’ s Secret Sessions where she played the album ahead of the release for fans, Swift reportedly said, “ If anyone made accusations of who this song is about we tell them it is 100 percent about her angel boyfriend of one year ” – referring to her British actor boyfriend, Joe Alwyn. The song also features a cameo by Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds ’ s daughter, James, who can be heard saying “ gorgeous ” at the beginning of the track. Always a rumour, the story was confirmed in July, 2018, when
